20110119010003.000|20110119010007.000|CC1|FIRED ON A SCHOOL CAMPUS.       
20110119010007.000|20110119010009.000|CC1|THIS HAPPENED THIS MORNING.     
20110119010009.000|20110119010010.000|CC1|IT WAS BEFORE LUNCH, A          
20110119010010.000|20110119010011.000|CC1|17-YEAR-OLD MALE STUDENT PLACED 
20110119010011.000|20110119010017.000|CC1|HIS BACKPACK ON A DESK IN A GOOR
20110119010017.000|20110119010021.000|CC1| -- A GARDENA HIGH SCHOOL CLAM. 
20110119010021.000|20110119010024.000|CC1|INSIDE, A SEMI LOADED HANDGUN   
20110119010024.000|20110119010025.000|CC1|WHICH DISCHARGED.               
20110119010025.000|20110119010028.000|CC1|>> IT HIT SOMEONE IN THE HEAD,  
20110119010028.000|20110119010028.000|CC1|AND THE GIRL FELL.              
20110119010028.000|20110119010029.000|CC1|SHE WAS SCREAMING, EVERYONE     
20110119010029.000|20110119010029.000|CC1|STARTED SCREAMING.              
20110119010029.000|20110119010031.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ONE ROUND WAS      
20110119010031.000|20110119010032.000|CC1|FIRED, TWO STUDENTS NEARBY WERE 
20110119010032.000|20110119010032.000|CC1|HIT.                            
20110119010032.000|20110119010034.000|CC1|THE MOST SERIOUSLY INJURED, A   
20110119010034.000|20110119010035.000|CC1|15-YEAR-OLD GIRL.               
20110119010035.000|20110119010039.000|CC1|BOTH WERE TRANSPORTED TO HARBOR 
20110119010039.000|20110119010039.000|CC1|UCLA MEDICAL CENTER.            
20110119010039.000|20110119010043.000|CC1|>> ONE WAS IN SERIOUS OR STABLE 
20110119010043.000|20110119010044.000|CC1|CONDITION WITH A GRAZE WOUND TO 
20110119010044.000|20110119010045.000|CC1|THE NECK.                       
20110119010045.000|20110119010047.000|CC1|ANOTHER STUDENT IS IN SURGERY,  
20110119010047.000|20110119010049.000|CC1|IN CRITICAL CONDITION.          
20110119010049.000|20110119010051.000|CC1|WITH A GUNSHOT WOUND TO THE     
20110119010051.000|20110119010052.000|CC1|TEMPLE AREA.                    
20110119010052.000|20110119010053.000|CC1|>> Reporter: INSIDE THE         
20110119010053.000|20110119010054.000|CC1|CLASSROOM, PANIC.               
20110119010054.000|20110119010055.000|CC1|STUDENTS SCREAMED, THE TEACHER  
20110119010055.000|20110119010056.000|CC1|CALLED FOR HELP.                
20110119010056.000|20110119010059.000|CC1|>> I HEARD IT -- I GOT SCARED.  
20110119010059.000|20110119010101.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE TEENAGE SUSPECT
20110119010101.000|20110119010102.000|CC1|RAN.                            
20110119010102.000|20110119010103.000|CC1|ARRIVING OFFICERS FROM L.A.     
20110119010103.000|20110119010105.000|CC1|UNIFIED POLICE AND THE LAPD     
20110119010105.000|20110119010107.000|CC1|QUICKLY PUT THE SCHOOL IN       
20110119010107.000|20110119010107.000|CC1|LOCKDOWN.                       
20110119010107.000|20110119010108.000|CC1|AFTER A BRIEF SEARCH, THE       
20110119010108.000|20110119010110.000|CC1|SUSPECT WAS FOUND IN ANOTHER    
20110119010110.000|20110119010110.000|CC1|CLASSROOM.                      
20110119010110.000|20110119010113.000|CC1|HE WAS TAKEN INTO CUSTODY AT    
20110119010113.000|20110119010113.000|CC1|GUNPOINT.                       
20110119010113.000|20110119010115.000|CC1|POLICE HAVE NOT RELEASED THE    
20110119010115.000|20110119010117.000|CC1|BOY'S IDENTITY AND HAVE NOT     
20110119010117.000|20110119010118.000|CC1|GIVEN A REASON FOR WHY HE HAD   
20110119010118.000|20110119010120.000|CC1|THE WEAPON OR HOW HE GOT IT ON  
20110119010120.000|20110119010120.000|CC1|CAMPUS.                         
20110119010120.000|20110119010122.000|CC1|>> THERE WAS NO STRUGGLE AS FAR 
20110119010122.000|20110119010123.000|CC1|AS TAKING HIM INTO CUSTODY.     
20110119010123.000|20110119010124.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SCHOOL BUSES WERE  
20110119010124.000|20110119010125.000|CC1|BROUGHT IN EARLY FOR A          
20110119010125.000|20110119010126.000|CC1|STRUCTURED RELEASE OF STUDENTS  
20110119010126.000|20110119010128.000|CC1|FROM THE SCHOOL.                
20110119010128.000|20110119010130.000|CC1|ADMINISTRATORS AT GARDENA HIGH  
20110119010130.000|20110119010136.000|CC1|LIKE OTHER LASD HIGH SCHOOLS USE
20110119010136.000|20110119010137.000|CC1|HAND-HELD METAL DETECTORS.      
20110119010137.000|20110119010139.000|CC1|THE SCHOOL OF 2,000 STUDENTS IS 
20110119010139.000|20110119010141.000|CC1|TOO BIG FOR DAILY SEARCHES      
20110119010141.000|20110119010141.000|CC1|ACCORDING TO OFFICIALS.         
20110119010141.000|20110119010143.000|CC1|>> NOT EVERY CLASSROOM, NOT     
20110119010143.000|20110119010145.000|CC1|EVERY STUDENT, NOT EVERY TIME IN
20110119010145.000|20110119010146.000|CC1|TERMS OF REPETITION.            
20110119010146.000|20110119010147.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE POLICY IS TO   
20110119010147.000|20110119010148.000|CC1|REMOVE GUNS THEY FIND AND DETER 
20110119010148.000|20110119010150.000|CC1|STUDENTS FROM BRINGING THEM ON  
20110119010150.000|20110119010150.000|CC1|TO CAMPUS.                      
20110119010150.000|20110119010152.000|CC1|AN EFFORT THAT THIS MORNING     
20110119010152.000|20110119010152.000|CC1|FAILED.                         
20110119010152.000|20110119010154.000|CC1|WITH TWO STUDENTS NOW IN THE    
20110119010154.000|20110119010156.000|CC1|HOSPITAL AND A THIRD FACING     
20110119010156.000|20110119010159.000|CC1|MULTIPLE FELONY COUNTS.         
20110119010159.000|20110119010201.000|CC1|WE'RE TOLD THE WEAPON WAS A     
20110119010201.000|20110119010207.000|CC1|BREAST CANCERETA .9-MILLIMETER  
20110119010207.000|20110119010215.000|CC1|SEMI -- WAS A .9-MILL MERE      
20110119010215.000|20110119010215.000|CC1|SEMIAUTOMATIC WEAPONS.          
20110119010215.000|20110119010216.000|CC1|OFFICIALS ARE REVIEWING THE     
20110119010216.000|20110119010218.000|CC1|POLICY OF WEAPONS ON CAMPUSES.  
20110119010218.000|20110119010221.000|CC1|CONAN NOLAN, CHANNEL 4          
20110119010221.000|20110119010221.000|CC1|EYEWITNESS NEWS.                
20110119010221.000|20110119010222.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU.                   
20110119010222.000|20110119010223.000|CC1|THE FOCUS IS ON THE CONDITION OF
20110119010223.000|20110119010224.000|CC1|THE TWO STUDENTS SHOT.          
20110119010224.000|20110119010226.000|CC1|WE'LL SWITCH LIVE TO KIM        
20110119010226.000|20110119010227.000|CC1|BALDONADO AT THE HOSPITAL THERE 
20110119010227.000|20110119010228.000|CC1|FOR THE LATEST.                 
20110119010228.000|20110119010229.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ABOUT 20 MINUTES   
20110119010229.000|20110119010230.000|CC1|AGO WE GOT AN UPDATE FROM       
20110119010230.000|20110119010231.000|CC1|DOCTORS HERE AT THE TRAUMA      
20110119010231.000|20110119010231.000|CC1|CENTER.                         
20110119010231.000|20110119010234.000|CC1|IT APPEARS A SINGLE BULLET DID  
20110119010234.000|20110119010235.000|CC1|STRIKE BOTH STUDENTS, FIRST     
20110119010235.000|20110119010237.000|CC1|HITTING THE 15-YEAR-OLD BOY IN  
20110119010237.000|20110119010237.000|CC1|THE NECK.                       
20110119010237.000|20110119010245.000|CC1|IT WAS A THROUGH-AND-THROUGH    
20110119010245.000|20110119010246.000|CC1|WOUND.                          
20110119010246.000|20110119010247.000|CC1|IT DID NOT HIT VITAL STRUCTURES.
20110119010247.000|20110119010248.000|CC1|HE'S NOT EXPECTED TO NEED       
20110119010248.000|20110119010249.000|CC1|SURGERY.                        
20110119010249.000|20110119010250.000|CC1|THE BULLET THEN STRUCK THE      
20110119010250.000|20110119010251.000|CC1|15-YEAR-OLD GIRL THIS THE HEAD. 
20110119010251.000|20110119010252.000|CC1|SHE WAS NOT CONSCIOUS WHEN SHE  
20110119010252.000|20110119010253.000|CC1|ARRIVED AT THE HOSPITAL.        
20110119010253.000|20110119010255.000|CC1|DOCTORS WERE ABLE TO GET HER    
20110119010255.000|20110119010256.000|CC1|INTO SURGERY WITHIN 30 MINUTES  
20110119010256.000|20110119010258.000|CC1|OF ARRIVING HERE.               
20110119010258.000|20110119010300.000|CC1|DOCTORS SAY THE BULLET DID NOT  
20110119010300.000|20110119010302.000|CC1|PENETRATE HER SKULL, BUT SHE    
20110119010302.000|20110119010305.000|CC1|STILL SUFFERED A SKULL FRACTURE.
20110119010305.000|20110119010307.000|CC1|DR. JAMES AUFMAN EXPLAINS.      
20110119010307.000|20110119010311.000|CC1|>> THE BULLET ITSELF HAD ENERGY,
20110119010311.000|20110119010314.000|CC1|WHICH DISSIPATED WHEN IT HIT    
20110119010314.000|20110119010314.000|CC1|SOMETHING.                      
20110119010314.000|20110119010316.000|CC1|AS IT GOES THROUGH THE AIR, IT  
20110119010316.000|20110119010317.000|CC1|HAS ENERGY PROPELLING IT        
20110119010317.000|20110119010317.000|CC1|FORWARD.                        
20110119010317.000|20110119010319.000|CC1|WHEN IT HITS SOMETHING, THAT    
20110119010319.000|20110119010321.000|CC1|ENERGY IS SPREAD TO THE         
20110119010321.000|20110119010322.000|CC1|SURROUNDING TISSUE.             
20110119010322.000|20110119010326.000|CC1|AND MOST LIKELY THAT'S HOW IT   
20110119010326.000|20110119010329.000|CC1|FRACTURED THE SKULL AND DID IT  
20110119010329.000|20110119010329.000|CC1|ITSELF.                         
20110119010329.000|20110119010331.000|CC1|THAT TRANSMITS SHOCKWAVES THAT  
20110119010332.000|20110119010332.000|XDS|%    TITLE:   
20110119010331.000|20110119010333.000|CC1|DR. ANDERSON HAS TOLD YOU CAN   
20110119010333.000|20110119010334.000|CC1|DAMAGE THE BRAIN ALSO.          
20110119010334.000|20110119010335.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AFTER SEVERAL HOURS
20110119010335.000|20110119010337.000|CC1|OF SURGERY, THE 5-YEAR-OLD GIRL 
20110119010337.000|20110119010338.000|CC1|IS JUST COMING OUT OF           
20110119010338.000|20110119010338.000|CC1|ANESTHESIA.                     
20110119010338.000|20110119010340.000|CC1|WE'RE TOLD FAMILY MEMBERS ARE   
20110119010340.000|20110119010342.000|CC1|WITH BOTH PATIENTS AT THIS TIME.
20110119010342.000|20110119010344.000|CC1|DOCTORS SEEM OPTIMISTIC ABOUT   
20110119010344.000|20110119010345.000|CC1|THE BOY WHO'S IN SERIOUS        
20110119010345.000|20110119010346.000|CC1|CONDITION.                      
20110119010346.000|20110119010347.000|CC1|AS FOR THE GIRL, THEY SAY       
20110119010347.000|20110119010349.000|CC1|THEY'LL BE WATCHING WITHIN THE  
20110119010349.000|20110119010350.000|CC1|NEXT 24 HOURS TO SEE IF SHE'S   
20110119010350.000|20110119010352.000|CC1|ABLE TO MOVE HER ARMS AND LEGS. 
20110119010352.000|20110119010354.000|CC1|SHE REMAINS IN CRITICAL         
20110119010354.000|20110119010355.000|CC1|CONDITION.

20110119010356.000|20110119010359.000|CC1|MEDICAL CENTER, I'M KIM         
20110119010359.000|20110119010359.000|CC1|BALDONADO.                      
20110119010359.000|20110119010400.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU.

20110119010400.000|20110119010401.000|CC1|>>> JUST FOR A LITTLE BACKGROUND
20110119010401.000|20110119010403.000|CC1|HERE, GARDENA HIGH IS A LARGE   
20110119010403.000|20110119010403.000|CC1|HIGH SCHOOL.                    
20110119010403.000|20110119010406.000|CC1|ABOUT 2,800 STUDENTS GO THERE.  
20110119010406.000|20110119010408.000|CC1|YOU CAN IMAGINE THE CHAOS WHEN  
20110119010408.000|20110119010409.000|CC1|THE PARENTS WERE NOTIFIED ABOUT 
20110119010409.000|20110119010410.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENED THIS MORNING      
20110119010410.000|20110119010412.000|CC1|THROUGH A PHONE MESSAGE.        
20110119010412.000|20110119010414.000|CC1|OUR TED CHEN IS LIVE WITH THAT  
20110119010414.000|20110119010416.000|CC1|PART OF OUR COVERAGE.           
20110119010416.000|20110119010416.000|CC1|TED?                            
20110119010416.000|20110119010418.000|CC1|>> Reporter: COLLEEN, ONE THING 
20110119010418.000|20110119010418.000|CC1|SEVERAL PARENTS TOLD            
20110119010418.000|20110119010419.000|CC1|SUBCOMMITTEE THAT THEY'RE GLAD  
20110119010419.000|20110119010421.000|CC1|THAT THEIR STUDENTS -- THEIR    
20110119010421.000|20110119010421.000|CC1|CHILDREN HAD CELL PHONES WITH   
20110119010421.000|20110119010422.000|CC1|THEM BECAUSE WHEN THEY FOUND OUT
20110119010422.000|20110119010425.000|CC1|ABOUT THE SHOOTING, THEY WERE   
20110119010425.000|20110119010426.000|CC1|ABLE TO CALL THEIR CHILDREN AND 
20110119010426.000|20110119010427.000|CC1|FIND OUT THAT THEY WERE OKAY.   
20110119010427.000|20110119010429.000|CC1|BUT STILL IN ORDER TO SEE THEM, 
20110119010429.000|20110119010431.000|CC1|THEY HAD TO WAIT FOR HOURS.     
20110119010431.000|20110119010433.000|CC1|IT WASN'T AN EASY THING,        
20110119010433.000|20110119010435.000|CC1|STANDING AROUND TO MAKE SURE    
20110119010435.000|20110119010436.000|CC1|YOUR CHILD IS OKAY.             
20110119010436.000|20110119010437.000|CC1|AND SOME GARDENA HIGH SCHOOL    
20110119010437.000|20110119010438.000|CC1|PARENTS TOOK OUT THEIR          
20110119010438.000|20110119010441.000|CC1|FRUSTRATIONS ON MENTAL HEALTH   
20110119010441.000|20110119010441.000|CC1|COUNSELORS.                     
20110119010441.000|20110119010442.000|CC1|>> THIS NEEDS TO BE A BETTER    
20110119010442.000|20110119010442.000|CC1|SCHOOL.                         
20110119010442.000|20110119010447.000|CC1|IN THE DAY, 1985, IT USED TO BE 
20110119010447.000|20110119010447.000|CC1|THE BEST.                       
20110119010447.000|20110119010450.000|CC1|NOT ANYMORE.                    
20110119010450.000|20110119010451.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THESE TWO PARENTS  
20110119010451.000|20110119010452.000|CC1|SAID THEY DIDN'T THINK GARDENA  
20110119010452.000|20110119010453.000|CC1|HIGH SCHOOL WAS SAFE.           
20110119010453.000|20110119010455.000|CC1|THEY CITED THE BIG FIGHT AT LAST
20110119010455.000|20110119010456.000|CC1|YEAR'S HOMECOMING GAME THAT     
20110119010456.000|20110119010457.000|CC1|INJURED A SECURITY OFFICER AND  
20110119010457.000|20110119010458.000|CC1|NOW THIS.                       
20110119010458.000|20110119010459.000|CC1|TWO STUDENTS HURT WHEN A GUN    
20110119010459.000|20110119010502.000|CC1|APPARENTLY ACCIDENTLY WENT OFF. 
20110119010502.000|20110119010504.000|CC1|>> I WAS SCARED BECAUSE I       
20110119010504.000|20110119010506.000|CC1|DIDN'T -- NEITHER ONE OF US     
20110119010506.000|20110119010508.000|CC1|EXPECTED THIS TO HAPPEN TODAY.  
20110119010508.000|20110119010509.000|CC1|OR ANY OTHER DAY.               
20110119010509.000|20110119010510.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THERE WAS RELIEF   
20110119010510.000|20110119010511.000|CC1|WHEN THE STUDENTS WERE FREED    
20110119010511.000|20110119010513.000|CC1|FROM THE LOCKDOWN AND FINALLY   
20110119010513.000|20110119010513.000|CC1|CAME OUT.                       
20110119010513.000|20110119010516.000|CC1|ONE STUDENT WAS CRYING, SO WAS  
20110119010516.000|20110119010519.000|CC1|SOPHIA WHEN REUNITED WITH HER   
20110119010519.000|20110119010519.000|CC1|SON.

20110119010520.000|20110119010520.000|CC1|RELATED.

20110119010523.000|20110119010524.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HOW DO YOU FEEL    
20110119010524.000|20110119010524.000|CC1|NOW?                            
20110119010524.000|20110119010526.000|CC1|>> I'M GOOD.                    
20110119010526.000|20110119010526.000|CC1|MOM --                          
20110119010526.000|20110119010530.000|CC1|>> WORRIED UNTIL I SAW MY SON IN
20110119010530.000|20110119010530.000|CC1|PERSON.

20110119010533.000|20110119010534.000|CC1|ONLY ONE WITH KNOTS.

20110119010541.000|20110119010542.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HOW ABOUT YOU, HOW

20110119010556.000|20110119010558.000|CC1|PARENTS TOLD US THEY LONG       
20110119010558.000|20110119010559.000|CC1|BELIEVED GARDENA HIGH SCHOOL

20110119010600.000|20110119010602.000|CC1|METAL DETECTORS TO KEEP THEIR   
20110119010602.000|20110119010603.000|CC1|CHILDREN SAFE.                  
20110119010603.000|20110119010604.000|CC1|THIS ON A DAY WHEN COMING HOME  
20110119010604.000|20110119010605.000|CC1|SAFELY WAS NO LONGER TAKEN FOR  
20110119010605.000|20110119010608.000|CC1|GRANTED.

20110119010609.000|20110119010610.000|CC1|WERE CONCERNED ABOUT THE SAFETY 
20110119010610.000|20110119010612.000|CC1|OF THE SCHOOL.                  
20110119010612.000|20110119010613.000|CC1|ONE PARENT DEFENDED IT SAYING   
20110119010613.000|20110119010614.000|CC1|THIS COULD HAVE HAPPENED        
20110119010614.000|20110119010615.000|CC1|ANYWHERE.

20110119012832.000|20110119012834.000|CC1|>>> TWO 15-YEAR-OLDS SHOT AT    
20110119012834.000|20110119012836.000|CC1|GARDENA HIGH SCHOOL.            
20110119012836.000|20110119012837.000|CC1|THE SCHOOL PUT INTO LOCKDOWN.   
20110119012837.000|20110119012839.000|CC1|THE VICTIMS ARE IN THE HOSPITAL 
20110119012839.000|20110119012841.000|CC1|INCLUDING THE VICTIM IN CRITICAL
20110119012841.000|20110119012841.000|CC1|CONDITION.                      
20110119012841.000|20110119012844.000|CC1|POLICE SAY THIS APPEAR TO BE AN 
20110119012844.000|20110119012844.000|CC1|ACCIDENT INVOLVING A TEENAGER   
20110119012844.000|20110119012849.000|CC1|WHO BROUGHT A GUN TO SCHOOL IN A
20110119012849.000|20110119012851.000|CC1|BACKPACK.                       
20110119012851.000|20110119012851.000|CC1|>> THE LATEST INFORMATION WE    
20110119012851.000|20110119012852.000|CC1|HAVE ON THE SHOOTING, AS CHUCK  
20110119012852.000|20110119012852.000|CC1|SAID.                           
20110119012852.000|20110119012854.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS NOW SAY THE       
20110119012854.000|20110119012855.000|CC1|SHOOTER SAID IT WAS AN ACCIDENT.
20110119012855.000|20110119012856.000|CC1|HE WAS SORRY.                   
20110119012856.000|20110119012857.000|CC1|HE SAID HE WAS SORRY AFTER THE  
20110119012857.000|20110119012900.000|CC1|GUN IN HIS BACKPACK SOMEHOW WENT
20110119012900.000|20110119012901.000|CC1|OFF AND HIT TWO OF HIS          
20110119012901.000|20110119012902.000|CC1|CLASSMATES.                     
20110119012902.000|20110119012906.000|CC1|ONE IN THE HEAD, ONE IN THE     
20110119012906.000|20110119012906.000|CC1|NECK.                           
20110119012906.000|20110119012909.000|CC1|IT HAPPENED AT 10:30 AT GARDENA 
20110119012909.000|20110119012910.000|CC1|HIGH SCHOOL.                    
20110119012910.000|20110119012911.000|CC1|THE SCHOOL PUT TO LOCKDOWN.     
20110119012911.000|20110119012912.000|CC1|THE SHOOTER DID NOT RESIST      
20110119012912.000|20110119012914.000|CC1|ARREST, AND IT DOES APPEAR THIS 
20110119012914.000|20110119012915.000|CC1|WAS AN ACCIDENT.                
20110119012915.000|20110119012917.000|CC1|THE SHOOTER BEING 17 YEARS OLD. 
20110119012917.000|20110119012919.000|CC1|THE TWO VICTIMS, THOUGH, REMAIN 
20110119012919.000|20110119012920.000|CC1|HOSPITALIZED.                   
20110119012920.000|20110119012920.000|CC1|BOTH 15-YEAR-OLDS.              
20110119012920.000|20110119012922.000|CC1|THE MORE SERIOUSLY INJURED      
20110119012922.000|20110119012924.000|CC1|STUDENT WAS HIT IN THE LEFT SIDE
20110119012924.000|20110119012925.000|CC1|OF THE HEAD.                    
20110119012925.000|20110119012927.000|CC1|SHE IS OUT OF SURGERY RIGHT NOW.
20110119012927.000|20110119012930.000|CC1|ALTHOUGH SHE DID GO TO MAJOR    
20110119012930.000|20110119012931.000|CC1|SURGERY -- GO THROUGH MAJOR     
20110119012931.000|20110119012932.000|CC1|SURGERY THIS AFTERNOON.         
20110119012932.000|20110119012936.000|CC1|>> THE BLOOD CLOT WAS REMOVED   
20110119012936.000|20110119012938.000|CC1|VERY QUICKLY.                   
20110119012938.000|20110119012940.000|CC1|THE BULLET WAS LEFT OUT BECAUSE 
20110119012940.000|20110119012942.000|CC1|AFTER THERE IS AN INJURY TO THE 
20110119012942.000|20110119012944.000|CC1|BRAIN, THE BRAIN SWELLS, USUALLY
20110119012944.000|20110119012945.000|CC1|WITHIN 48 HOURS.                
20110119012945.000|20110119012946.000|CC1|AND THIS PROVIDES ROOM FOR THE  
20110119012946.000|20110119012949.000|CC1|BRAIN TO EXPAND.                
20110119012949.000|20110119012952.000|CC1|>> DOCTORS SAY A BRAIN SCAN     
20110119012952.000|20110119012953.000|CC1|LOOKS FAVORABLE AT THIS POINT,  
20110119012953.000|20110119012955.000|CC1|THAT YOUNG GIRL IS STILL IN     
20110119012955.000|20110119012955.000|CC1|CRITICAL CONDITION.             
20110119012955.000|20110119012958.000|CC1|SHE IS 15, AS I SAID.           
20110119012958.000|20110119013000.000|CC1|THE OTHER VICTIM, ALSO A        
20110119013000.000|20110119013001.000|CC1|15-YEAR-OLD, IS A BOY IN SERIOUS
20110119013001.000|20110119013002.000|CC1|CONDITION WITH A NECK WOUND.    
20110119013002.000|20110119013004.000|CC1|WE WILL HAVE A LIVE UPDATE AT   
20110119013004.000|20110119013005.000|CC1|6:00 THIS AFTERNOON.

20110119013014.000|20110119013308.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110119013014.000|20110119013015.000|CC1|>>> FACEBOOK COULD BECOME A TOOL
20110119013015.000|20110119013016.000|CC1|TO SHAME SUSPECTED DRUNK DRIVERS
20110119013016.000|20110119013019.000|CC1|ARRESTED IN HUNTINGTON BEACH.   
20110119013019.000|20110119013020.000|CC1|ONE CITY COUNCIL MEMBER THERE   
20110119013020.000|20110119013021.000|CC1|WANTS THE POLICE DEPARTMENT'S
